inclusion.criterion: Diabetic patient type 2 with history of chronic heart failure(HFrEF)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Admission for acute decompensated heart failure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: an oral loop diuretic for at least 1 month before admission
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other etiologies of fluid overload different from heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unstable patients: acute coronary syndrome, cardiogenic shock
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients requiring inotropic agents or renal dialysis.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes and cardiomyopathy. He is being treated with ACE inhibitors, Beta blockers, and Insulin.
